testResults.message:
[1m[31m  [1m● [22m[1mEthereum Validator › Valid Addresses › should validate non-prefixed checksummed address after formatting[39m[22m

    [2mexpect([22m[31mreceived[39m[2m).[22mtoBe[2m([22m[32mexpected[39m[2m) // Object.is equality[22m

    Expected: [32mfalse[39m
    Received: [31mtrue[39m
[2m[22m
[2m    [0m [90m 28 |[39m             [90m// validation alone should fail (by design)[39m[22m
[2m     [90m 29 |[39m             [36mconst[39m validation [33m=[39m validateAddress(raw[33m,[39m [32m'ethereum'[39m)[33m;[39m[22m
[2m    [31m[1m>[22m[2m[39m[90m 30 |[39m             expect(validation[33m.[39mvalid)[33m.[39mtoBe([36mfalse[39m)[33m;[39m[22m
[2m     [90m    |[39m                                      [31m[1m^[22m[2m[39m[22m
[2m     [90m 31 |[39m[22m
[2m     [90m 32 |[39m             [90m// formatting should normalize it[39m[22m
[2m     [90m 33 |[39m             [36mconst[39m formatted [33m=[39m formatAddress(raw[33m,[39m [32m'ethereum'[39m[33m,[39m { checksum[33m:[39m [36mtrue[39m })[33m;[39m[0m[22m
[2m[22m
[2m      [2mat Object.<anonymous> ([22m[2m[0m[36mtests/ethereum.test.ts[39m[0m[2m:30:38)[22m[2m[22m

[1m[31m  [1m● [22m[1mEthereum Validator › Formatting › should shorten address[39m[22m

    [2mexpect([22m[31mreceived[39m[2m).[22mtoBe[2m([22m[32mexpected[39m[2m) // Object.is equality[22m

    Expected: [32m"0xd8d[7ma[27m...6045"[39m
    Received: [31m"0xd8d[7mA[27m...6045"[39m
[2m[22m
[2m    [0m [90m 105 |[39m             )[33m;[39m[22m
[2m     [90m 106 |[39m[22m
[2m    [31m[1m>[22m[2m[39m[90m 107 |[39m             expect(shortened)[33m.[39mtoBe([32m'0xd8da...6045'[39m)[33m;[39m[22m
[2m     [90m     |[39m                               [31m[1m^[22m[2m[39m[22m
[2m     [90m 108 |[39m         })[33m;[39m[22m
[2m     [90m 109 |[39m     })[33m;[39m[22m
[2m     [90m 110 |[39m })[33m;[39m[0m[22m
[2m[22m
[2m      [2mat Object.<anonymous> ([22m[2m[0m[36mtests/ethereum.test.ts[39m[0m[2m:107:31)[22m[2m[22m
